# Paramize: Langchain Integration

## Requirements

* Works with Python: 3.7 onwards.

## Installation

It's recommended you use [virtualenv](https://virtualenv.pypa.io/en/latest/) to create isolated Python environments.

```bash
pip install paramize-sdk
```
